about_the_game:
This DLC contains two introductory cutscenes for the unreleased witch game. Initial concept for the first witch.
If you are interested, download and open the folder "cradle"

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is for adults only. 
This game contains sexual content as well non-consensual sex and  light sexual assault

detailed_description:
This DLC contains two introductory cutscenes for the unreleased witch game. Initial concept for the first witch.
If you are interested, download and open the folder "cradle"
name: Witch 2 Hell Adventure (cradle of the first game)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 1024Vram
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: This DLC contains two introductory cutscenes for the unreleased witch game
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese
